edu.biu.scapi.primitives.trapdoorPermutation

Interface RabinPermutation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TrapdoorPermutation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CryptoPpRabinPermutation

    public interface RabinPermutation
extends TrapdoorPermutation
    Marker interface. Each Rabin concrete class should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.math.BigInteger getModulus()
      Rabin permutation is a trapdoor permutations written as exponentiation modulo a composite number N called the modulus.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.primitives.trapdoorPermutation.TrapdoorPermutation

    • Method Detail

      • getModulus

        java.math.BigInteger getModulus()
        Rabin permutation is a trapdoor permutations written as exponentiation modulo a composite number N called the modulus. This function returns this modulus.
        Returns:
        the modulus of the permutation.
